means: 暂时的停顿
犹豫
（诗中）节奏的停顿
[乐]延长号
暂停，中止
逗留，停滞
（按暂停键）暂停放音
犹豫

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"中止，停止，休息"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: break, rest, pause, interval, recess, cease, stop
means: break ： 非正式用词，指突然的或短时间的中止，如工作或活动期间接短暂休息。
rest ： 指统称的休息。
pause ： 指短暂的中断或停止，含再进行下去的意味。
interval ： 指一出戏在幕与幕之间，音乐会上下串场之间或演出中预先安排的休息；也可泛指事件之间的一段时间。
recess ： 正式用词，指业务活动或工作中短暂的或长时间的休息。
cease ： 正式用词，侧重逐渐结呸某活动或状态，含永远结束的意味。
stop ： 普通用词，指迅速或突然中止某行为、活动或状态。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"停止"之意。
means: cease ： 指逐渐、徐徐中止某种状态的存在。书面用词。
pause ： 指暂时的、瞬间的停顿，隐含有再进行之意。
stop ： 指动作、运行、进展等被停下来，含突然、断然的意味。
halt ： 侧重突然地、决定性地终止、停止某一活动。
quit ： 指最终彻底停止某事，有时暗示遭到失败或面临挫折。

sentence.Network_en: After a pause he asked, "You got any identification?"
sentence.Network_cn: 稍稍停顿了一下，他问道，“你有任何身份证明吗？”

sentence.Network_en: "We need proof, sir." Another pause. Then, "Very well."
sentence.Network_cn: “我们需要证据，先生。”又是一个短暂停顿。然后，“那好吧。”

sentence.Network_en: After a pause Alex said sharply: "I'm sorry if I've upset you"
sentence.Network_cn: 歇了一会儿后，亚历克斯毫不客气地说：“要是让你心烦了，那我很抱歉。”

phrase.cizu_name: give pause to someone (或give pause for thought)

jx.jx_en_mean: cause someone to think carefully or hesitate before doing something

lj.lj_ly: the sight of these gives any would-be attacker pause for thought.
lj.lj_ls: 看到这些情况，每个可能的攻击者都会踌躇不前。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin pausa, from Greek pausis, from pausein 'to stop'

encyclopedia.content: 一、 pause() 功能：让进程暂停直到信号出现 相关函数： kill，signal，sleep 表头文件： #include<unistd.h> 定义函数： int pause(void); 函数说明： pause()会令目前的进程暂停（进入睡眠状态），直到被信号(signal)所中断。 返回值： 只返回-1。 错误代码 EINTR 有信号到达中断了此函数。 例子 #include <stdio.h> #include <stdlib.h> #include <unistd.h> int main( void ) { /* set an alarm to g

entry.def: If you pause while you are doing something, you stop for a short period and then continue.

example.ex: 'It's rather embarrassing,' he began, and paused...
example.tran: “非常令人难堪，”他开口道，然后停顿了一下。

example.ex: He had to pause to clear his throat...
example.tran: 他不得不停顿一下清清嗓子。

entry.def: A pause is a short period when you stop doing something before continuing.

example.ex: After a pause Alex said sharply: 'I'm sorry if I've upset you'...
example.tran: 歇了一会儿后，亚历克斯毫不客气地说：“要是让你心烦了，那我很抱歉。”

example.ex: There was a pause while the barmaid set down two plates in front of us.
example.tran: 酒吧女招待在我们面前摆放两个盘子时停顿了一下。

entry.def: If something gives you pause for thought, it makes you think carefully about something, especially in a different way than you have thought about it before.

example.ex: An opposition spokesman said he hoped the agreement would give them pause for thought about the futility of violence.
example.tran: 反对派发言人说他希望协议能够让他们仔细想想暴力行为毫无意义。

means.word_mean: 1. a time interval during which there is a temporary cessation of something
1. interrupt temporarily an activity before continuing;

auth_sentence.content: Hitting other boxers can give you pause for thought.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hitting other boxers can give you pause for thought.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hitting other boxers can give you pause for thought.

auth_sentence.content: This research will certainly give them pause for thought.
auth_sentence.res_content: This research will certainly give them pause for thought.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This research will certainly give them pause for thought.

auth_sentence.content: There was a short pause before morning service began.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was a short pause before morning service began.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was a short pause before morning service began.

Sentence.sentence: At the same time, technological innovation (创新) will barely pause for breath, and two big political changes seem likely.
A Nation That's Losing Its Toolbox The scene inside the Home Depot on Weyman Avenue here would give the old-time American craftsman pause

sentences.en: He came to a pause in reading and then went on reading.
sentences.cn: 他在阅读中停顿了一下, 又继续念下去。

sentences.en: He broke off and paused a moment.
sentences.cn: 他说不下去了, 停了一会儿。

jushi.english: She paused a little and Philip pressed her to tell it.
jushi.chinese: 她踌躇了一下,但菲利普催她把那件事说出来。

jushi.english: As he passed the next cabin he paused a minute.
jushi.chinese: 当他走过隔壁客舱时,他停了一会儿。

jushi.english: Gemma paused an instant in the doorway.
jushi.chinese: 吉玛在门口稍停了片刻。
